name: Hookscrap
description:
Save The Galaxy


Step into the cockpit and become the owner of Hookscrap Salvage & Repair, navigating the dangers of the galaxy in this thrilling 2D space rogue-like. The acquisition of the galaxy by Space Govt. Inc (SGI) seemed to have no effect on your business... until they sent the Space Police Force to destroy the warpgates, isolating the galaxy and putting Hookscrap in peril.

But you won't go down without a fight. The only way to save Hookscrap and the galaxy is to embark on a dangerous mission to fix the warpgates and defeat the SC Judgement, the head of the Space Police Force.

Explore Unique Environments



Experience a rich and immersive world with the procedurally generated arrangement of 5 unique levels, making each playthrough unique and full of new challenges to overcome. Uncover the secrets scattered throughout different regions of the galaxy.

Upgrade and Grow Stronger



Choose from 11 different components to change how you play and suit you and your play style. Discover a multitude of possible ship upgrade combinations over at the Rest Station. Combine up to 10 unique loot items droped from other ships with your upgrades for gratifying results.

Fight 'Till The End



Fight, outmaneuver, and outsmart endless waves of enemies that grow in size and difficulty as time progresses. Face off against special enemies that require their own strategy when engaging. Scale up your power and overcome the challenges ahead in preparation for the final threat - The SC Judgement.
